scripts.develop:deploy: vite build --mode develop; firebase deploy --only hosting:develop-candidate-app -P develop
scripts.staging:deploy: vite build --mode staging; firebase deploy --only hosting:staging-candidate-app -P staging
scripts.production:deploy: vite build --mode production; firebase deploy --only hosting:production-candidate-app -P production
scripts.develop:deploy-preview: vite build --mode develop; firebase hosting:channel:deploy --only develop-candidate-app $1 --expires 30d -P develop
scripts.staging:deploy-preview: vite build --mode staging; firebase hosting:channel:deploy --only staging-candidate-app $1 --expires 30d -P staging
scripts.production:deploy-preview: vite build --mode production; firebase hosting:channel:deploy --only production-candidate-app $1 --expires 30d -P production
scripts.develop:deploy-service-offline: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp service-offline/index.html dist/index.html && firebase deploy --only hosting:develop-candidate-app -P develop
scripts.staging:deploy-service-offline: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp service-offline/index.html dist/index.html && firebase deploy --only hosting:staging-candidate-app -P staging
scripts.production:deploy-service-offline: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp service-offline/index.html dist/index.html && firebase deploy --only hosting:production-candidate-app -P production
